document.masterDocTitle: Descriptions, records, and key to the Hydrometra Latreille, 1796 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Hydrometridae) from Colombia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Descriptions, records, and key to the Hydrometra Latreille, 1796 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Hydrometridae) from Colombia

bibRefCitation.author: Guerin-Meneville, F. E.
bibRefCitation.refString: Guerin-Meneville, F. E. (1857) Ordre des Hemipteres, Latr. Premiere Section. Heteropteres, Latr. In: de la Sagra, R. (Ed.), Histoire Physique, Politique et Naturelle de l'Ile de Cuba. Arthus Bertrand, Paris, pp. 359 - 424.

Distribution. Brazil
: Amazonas ( Torre-Bueno 1926 , Hungerford & Evans 1934 , Nieser 1970 ,
Moreira et al. 2009
).
Colombia
: Antioquia ( Álvarez & Roldán 1983, this work ), Atlántico ( Hungerford & Evans 1934 ), Bolívar, Caldas (this work), Cauca ( Padilla-Gil 2016 ), Cesar (Morales et al. 2008; this work), Cundinamarca , Huila , La Guajira (this work), Magdalena ( Torre-Bueno 1926 , Hungerford & Evans 1934 ), Nariño ( Padilla-Gil 2013b ), Quindío ( Morales & Molano 2008, this work ), Santander (this work), Valle del Cauca ( Morales & Molano 2008 ).
Costa Rica
: Alajuela ( Kirkaldy 1909 ), Guanacaste ( Maier 1977 ,
Pacheco-Chaves et al. 2014
), Puntarenas (
Pacheco-Chaves et al. 2014
).
Cuba
( Guérin-Méneville 1857 ): Cienfuegos ( Hungerford & Evans 1934 , Alayo 1967 ), Guantánamo (
Muñoz et al. 2012
), Holguín (
Muñoz et al. 2010
), Pinar del Río ( Torre-Bueno 1926 ,
Megna et al. 2005
).
Ecuador
: Esmeraldas ( Buzzetti & Cianferoni 2011 ), Guayas ( Kirkaldy 1902 ), Los Rios (
Floriano et al. 2017
).
El Salvador
( Drake & Lauck 1959 ).
Guadeloupe
: Pointe-à-Pitre ( Nieser 1970 ).
Guatemala
: Izabal , Zacapa ( Torre-Bueno 1926 ).
Guyana
( Drake 1954 ).
Haiti
( Hungerford & Evans 1934 ).
Honduras
( Drake 1954 ).
Jamaica
( Drake & Lauck 1959 ).
Martinique
: Le Marin ( Nieser 1970 ).
Mexico
( Drake 1954 ).
Nicaragua
( Drake & Lauck 1959 ).
Panama
: Chiriquí , Panama ( Champion 1897 ).
Peru
( Drake & Lauck 1959 ): Madre de Dios ( Peralta-Argomeda 2011 ).
Puerto Rico
( Drake & Lauck 1959 ).
Trinidad & Tobago
: Siparia (Nieser & Alkins- Koo 1991).
Venezuela
( Drake 1954 ): Portuguesa (
Floriano et al. 2017
).
Note. We present above the first records of this species from the Colombian departments of Bolívar , Caldas ,
Cundinamarca, Huila, La Guajira , and Santander ( Fig. 8 ).
